input.sentences: there were a ton of people that were about to show up for the event tonight .
soon the room was completely packed .
everyone was dancing and having a good time .
there were a lot of people chatting together .
the party lasted well into the evening .
output.sentences: Vicky's company party had a kicking D.J..
All the employees couldn't wait for the music to start.
Vicky was the first to get up and dance.
Some of the employees chose to converse rather than dance.
The employees couldn't stop talking about the D.J. music selection.
